title: LATAM Connections & Media Activations Lead (Mexico)
content:
Airbnb was born in 2007 when two Hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million Hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, Hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.The Community You Will Join:
Airbnb’s Marketing organization are storytellers, creators and relentless community champions, responsible for sharing the Airbnb love around the world by creating magical, memorable, shareable experiences that inspire and grow our community.
The Difference You Will Make:
Located in Mexico and as the Latam Connections & Media Activation Lead, you will be accountable for the ingenuity, effectiveness and efficiency of the Media plans that are developed and activated across the region (with a particular focus on Latam) in support of our business objectives. To do this will require close collaboration with teams across Airbnb, including Regional Brand Marketing, Growth Marketing, Measurement & Analytics, Consumer Insights, FP&A (Financial Planning and Analysis), Data Science, Social and Corporate Communications teams. You must be laser focused on outcomes, holding both our agencies and co-workers to deliver optimum value for our investments, defining KPIs, and tasking those responsible for excellence in activation. You will also have a keen eye on how to best leverage media in order to enhance the creative story, influencing asset production and formats, flagging opportunities and testing new ideas.
You will need to be able to see the big picture, visualizing the impact that the breadth of our activity has on our target audience, and co-create the Media principles by which we operate, while being able to review and advise on the minutiae of our plans. 
In this role, you will report to the Head of Media. 
A Typical Day:

Manage the regional relationship with our global media agencies of record. 
Work with the marketing and cross-functional teams based throughout the region to ensure cohesive regional media strategies focused around internally-aligned go-to-market approaches. Emphasis on optimizing for media efficiency, creative execution, local relevance and campaign objectives.
Partner with a global media team, based in NA, EMEA and APAC, to develop truly nuanced and culturally relevant media strategies worldwide. Inspire and enable the team to maximize quality of work and augment their capabilities.
Manage development of global campaigns from media strategy through campaign execution and reporting. Areas of focus include media planning, media mix development, media planning & buying, performance measurement, budget management, online tracking, buy evaluation, and optimization.
Support budget and strategy planning with global teams, working closely with Financial Planning (FP&A) and Marketing Leadership.
Foster an environment for cross-departmental collaboration by working effectively with Brand & Product Marketing, Creative, Finance, Growth Marketing, and Corporate Communication teams.
Manage and nurture media talent.

Your Expertise:

Passion for travel and all things Airbnb. Experience hosting on the site is a huge plus.
10+ years experience at digital, advertising or media agencies and/or experience managing media at a client business — preferably in the consumer internet space in travel, design, technology, or lifestyle brands.
Experience with leading plan development from beginning to end with little oversight. Must be able to think holistically but also ensure the details are addressed.
In-depth knowledge of the efficacy of all media channels, with a proven track record in digital, social, television and other offline media. 
Deep understanding of market trends and fluency with brand measurement metrics and analytics.
Passion for understanding the various consumer segments by market and their media behaviors is essential.
Experience in managing Global media programs and evaluating strategic, local media partners.
Ability to lead, influence and work across organizational boundaries with a track record of building excellent relationships with a broad range of peers and executives across global markets.
A track record of achievements in dramatically improving media performance and tracking performance against KPIs. Proven experience using media to drive growth of a consumer product at global scale.
Consumer insights and data-driven.
Willingness to take risks and challenge traditional approaches
Fluency in English and Spanish is required
This position will require occasional travel within LATAM and other locations globally.

Your Location:
This position is based in Mexico. The role will include occasional work at an Airbnb office or attendance at offsites, as agreed to with your manager.
Our Commitment To Inclusion & Belonging:
Airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. We believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.

questions.description:
Airbnb está comprometida en crear un ambiente de trabajo de inclusión y diversidad. A efecto de evaluar nuestros esfuerzos en ese sentido, invitamos a los candidatos a responder voluntariamente una serie de preguntas. La respuesta a cada pregunta es enteramente voluntaria y si deciden no responder, no se generará tratamiento negativo alguno. La respuesta que elija proveer será mantenida bajo confidencialidad, y no será compartida con los supervisores que se encargan del proceso de reclutamiento. (Airbnb is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse work environment. In order to evaluate our efforts in this regard, we invite candidates to voluntarily answer a series of questions. The answer to each question is entirely voluntary and if they decide not to answer, no negative treatment will be generated. The response you choose to provide will be kept confidential, and will not be shared with the supervisors who are in charge of the recruitment process.)  

Airbnb no discrimina en su proceso de reclutamiento y todas las personas que aplican a un empleo en Airbnb son consideradas sin importar su origen étnico, religión, nacionalidad, edad, sexo, estado civil, ascendencia, discapacidad física o mental, género con que se identifique, orientación sexual, o cualquier otra característica protegida por ley. La oportunidad de proporcionar la información antes señalada le es dada con el objetivo de ayudarnos a medir nuestros esfuerzos por mejorar la inclusión y la diversidad, y para cumplir con nuestros estándares internos de brindar acceso igualitario a oportunidades laborales. (Airbnb does not discriminate in its recruitment process and all people who apply for a job on Airbnb are considered regardless of their ethnic origin, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, gender with which they identify , sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by law. The opportunity to provide the aforementioned information is given to you in order to help us measure our efforts to improve inclusion and diversity, and to comply with our internal standards of providing equal access to employment opportunities.)

Toda su información personal, incluyendo su género, origen étnico, e información sobre discapacidades físicas o mentales, en caso que elija proporcionarlas, será recolectada, almacenada y procesada de acuerdo con el Aviso de Privacidad de Airbnb. (All of your personal information, including your gender, ethnicity, and information on physical or mental disabilities, should you choose to provide it, will be collected, stored and processed in accordance with the Airbnb Privacy Notice.)

Por favor, haga click acá para leer el Aviso de Privacidad de Airbnb, y por favor haga click debajo para aceptarlo. Este Aviso de Privacidad no es un contrato, tácito o expreso, y no establece términos o condiciones de empleo. (Please click here to read the Airbnb Privacy Notice, and please click below to accept it. This Privacy Notice is not a contract, tacit or express, and does not establish terms or conditions of employment.)
